text: Abahamba-hambanga na ehlabathini babone ukuba sabanjani na isiphelo sabo babengaphambili kunabo? Bona babebakhulu kunabo ngokwamandla, yaye babelima umhlaba, besakha ngaphezulu kunokuba bona bakhile. Ke kaloku abaThunywa2 babo beza kubo nemiqondiso ecacileyo.Yaye uAll√¢h Wayengekhe Abenze ubugwenxa, koko ngabo ngokwabo abazenza ubugwenxa
